name: Curveball (yaomon)
description:
Like pong but the ball curves. Slice the ball to curve it. Game was made in 2 days with Game Maker Studio 2 Trial and published with Game Maker Studio 2 for the purposes of learning Game Maker Studio 2.

W/S - Player 1 Move

Space - Player 1 Skill

Up/Down - Player 2 Move

Enter - Player 2 Skill
